channel.title: Invisible Block?
channel.description:
I need help, i'm making a server. I'm trying to make it and improve on it later on. Although i've only finished Lumbridge I need to stop people from leaving the city, i've done the whole teleports and other possible ways besides leaving through walking. I don't want the server to look scruffy with a random barrel in the way, i've seen a server with an invisible block that you can't go past.
Does anyone know?

add like the invisble object… the one with no texture.
